modern-downtown-condo.title: Modern Downtown Condo Transformation
modern-downtown-condo.challenge: The client wanted to transform their dated condo into a modern, bright living space while minimizing disruption to their busy schedule. The project required precise color matching and working around existing furniture.
modern-downtown-condo.solution: Our team developed a phased approach, completing one room at a time to allow the client to continue living in the space. We used low-VOC premium paints and implemented careful surface preparation to ensure a flawless finish.
results: Zero disruption to client's daily routine
Transformed dark spaces into bright, modern rooms
Client referred 3 additional projects within the same building

testimonial.quote: Ascent Group exceeded all expectations. Their attention to detail and professionalism made the entire process stress-free. The transformation is stunning!
testimonial.author: Sarah M.

heritage-home-stucco.title: Heritage Home EIFS Restoration
heritage-home-stucco.challenge: A 1920s heritage home had deteriorating stucco with water infiltration issues. The owners wanted to preserve the historic character while upgrading to modern, energy-efficient materials.
heritage-home-stucco.solution: We designed a custom EIFS system that replicated the original stucco texture while providing superior insulation and waterproofing. All work was done in compliance with heritage preservation guidelines.
results: Heritage board approval on first submission

testimonial.quote: They perfectly balanced preserving our home's character with modern performance. The craftsmanship is outstanding.
testimonial.author: Robert & Linda K.

oakville-exterior-repaint.title: Oakville Family Home Exterior
oakville-exterior-repaint.challenge: Severe paint failure from previous DIY attempts, with peeling, cracking, and exposed wood in multiple areas. Client needed weather-resistant solution before winter.
oakville-exterior-repaint.solution: Complete surface preparation including scraping, sanding, and wood repair. Applied premium weather-resistant coating system with proper primers and two finish coats.

testimonial.quote: After our DIY disaster, Ascent Group rescued our home. Their expertise and quality are unmatched.
testimonial.author: Michael J.

luxury-kitchen-cabinets.title: Luxury Kitchen Cabinet Refinish
luxury-kitchen-cabinets.challenge: Client wanted to update their kitchen without the cost and disruption of full cabinet replacement. Required factory-quality finish with custom color.
luxury-kitchen-cabinets.solution: Professional spray finishing in our climate-controlled facility. Custom color matching to client's specification using premium conversion varnish.
results: Kitchen ready to use in 1 week

testimonial.quote: I can't believe these are the same cabinets! The finish is flawless and the color is exactly what I wanted.
